text: Sonia Rosa Chang-Díaz (born March 31, 1978) is an American politician. She is in the Massachusetts Senate from the 2nd Suffolk district since 2009. She is a member of the Democratic Party. She was the first Hispanic woman elected to the state senate. She ran for the Democratic nomination for Governor of Massachusetts in the 2022 election. Chang-Díaz was born in Boston, Massachusetts. She studied at the University of Virginia. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Boston Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Sonia Chang-Díaz
